name: fizko-v2
description: Fizko - Plataforma de gestión tributaria y contable con IA para pequeñas empresas chilenas

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.backend: uv sync --directory backend && uv run --directory backend python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8089

author: Akashi Labs
